sentences.spanish: Aunque llueva, iremos de excursión al hermoso bosque cercano
sentences.english: Even if it rains, we will go on a hike to the beautiful nearby forest
sentences.spanish_pronunciation: AUN-ke yue-VA, ee-RE-mos de eks-kur-SYON al er-MO-so BOS-ke ser-KA-no

sentences.spanish: Disfrutamos de una cena tranquila mientras el sol se pone
sentences.english: We enjoyed a quiet dinner as the sun was setting
sentences.spanish_pronunciation: Dis-froo-TA-mos de OO-na SE-na trank-KEE-la MEE-en-tras el sol se PO-ne

sentences.spanish: Después de años, volví a encontrar mi antiguo cuaderno de dibujos
sentences.english: After years, I found my old sketchbook again
sentences.spanish_pronunciation: Des-PUES de A-nyos, vol-VEE a en-kon-TRAR mee an-TEE-gwo kwa-DER-no de di-BU-khos

sentences.spanish: Exploramos calles estrechas llenas de historia y arquitectura fascinante
sentences.english: We explored narrow streets full of history and fascinating architecture
sentences.spanish_pronunciation: Ex-plo-RA-mos KA-yes es-TRE-chas YEN-as de is-TO-ria ee ar-ki-TEK-tu-ra fas-si-NAN-te

sentences.spanish: Al atardecer, el cielo se tiñó de tonos cálidos y vibrantes
sentences.english: At sunset, the sky was painted with warm and vibrant hues
sentences.spanish_pronunciation: Al a-tar-de-SER, el SYE-lo se TYE-nyo de TO-nos KAL-ee-dos ee breen-TAN-tes

sentences.spanish: La abuela siempre nos contaba cuentos antes de dormir felices
sentences.english: Grandma would always tell us bedtime stories, making us happy
sentences.spanish_pronunciation: La a-BWE-la SYEM-pre nos kon-TA-ba KWEHn-tos an-tes de dor-MEER fe-LEE-thes

sentences.spanish: Aprendimos lecciones valiosas de las adversidades que enfrentamos juntos
sentences.english: We learned valuable lessons from the adversities we faced together
sentences.spanish_pronunciation: A-pren-DEE-mos le-SYO-nes va-LYO-sas de las a-dver-si-DA-des ke en-fren-TA-mos HUN-tos

sentences.spanish: Recorrimos senderos desconocidos, descubriendo secretos ocultos en la naturaleza
sentences.english: We walked unknown trails, discovering hidden secrets in nature
sentences.spanish_pronunciation: Re-kor-REE-mos sen-DE-ros des-ko-NO-ci-dos, des-koo-BRYEN-do se-KRE-tos o-KUL-tos en la na-tu-ra-LE-za

sentences.spanish: La música suave acompañaba nuestras conversaciones en la terraza iluminada
sentences.english: Soft music accompanied our conversations on the illuminated terrace
sentences.spanish_pronunciation: La MOO-see-ka SWA-ve a-kom-PA-ña-ba NUES-tras kon-ver-sa-SYO-nes en la te-RA-tha i-lu-mi-NA-da

sentences.spanish: Después de mucho esfuerzo, alcanzamos la cima y celebramos la victoria
sentences.english: After much effort, we reached the summit and celebrated our victory
sentences.spanish_pronunciation: Des-PUES de MOO-cho es-FWER-tho, al-KAN-sa-mos la SEE-ma ee se-le-BRA-mos la vik-TO-ria
